definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
sunshine/to shine upon/variant of 輝|辉[hui1]

sentences.english: The web was silver and gold in the evening sun.
sentences.chinese: 網在落日餘暉中銀光光金閃閃。

sentences.english: And could the "Greek serenity" of later Greek periods be only a red sunset?
sentences.chinese: 古希臘後期的“希臘的寧靜”只能是一片落日的餘暉？

sentences.english: The light of the setting sun suffused the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 落日餘暉離開了峯頂，谷內暮色蒼茫。

sentences.english: The setting sun tinged the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 落日餘暉微染那片雲層。

sentences.english: Our system is also useful for asteroid occultations and gamma-ray burst afterglows.
sentences.chinese: 我們的系統也適合觀測小行星掩星以及迦瑪爆餘暉源。

sentences.english: As flight of wild geese flew into the afterglow, crying merrily all the way.
sentences.chinese: 一羣大雁一邊歡叫着一邊飛向落日的餘暉中。

sentences.english: If one day the bell rang in the twilight, that is what I cry for you.
sentences.chinese: 如果有一天，車鈴在餘暉中響起，那是我在爲你哭泣。

sentences.english: In the light of the sunset it seemed alive.
sentences.chinese: 在夕陽餘暉下，它看來好象是活的。

sentences.english: Sun Valley is filled with late afternoon light and there is a chill in the air.
sentences.chinese: 森瓦利灑滿了夕陽的餘暉，空氣裏有一絲涼意。

sentences.english: The sun sets over the Islington substation in Christchurch, New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 落日的餘暉籠罩着新西蘭基督城的伊斯靈頓變電站。

sentences.english: Like a candle in the wind. Never fading with the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 餘暉從未隨日落而稍減。

sentences.english: I only wish you were here to share it with me.
sentences.chinese: 我只想與你在此共賞落日餘暉。

sentences.english: The blue reflection is caused by sunlight that passes through a cavity underwater and shines through the seawater.
sentences.chinese: 藍色的倒影，落日的餘暉穿過水下的陽光照過海面。

sentences.english: Valley glow of the late-afternoon sun, The mountain body under the move cloud's shadows.
sentences.chinese: 日落餘暉照耀下的河谷，移動雲影下的山體。

sentences.english: Often the best scenes are those being ignited by the warm light of the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 那些被落日的餘暉照亮的景物往往纔是最好的對象。

sentences.english: The pinnacle of the pagoda caught the last of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽的餘暉照射到塔尖上。

definition: (of a city etc) ablaze with lights
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
Kaiyuan county level city in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan
